TopicTitle: kepler 452b has inspired an Idea for an expansion.

Articles.Content:
Simply put, 

An expansion for exploration sending out probes to find new planets and figure out ways to get kerbals there. 

Possibly even find a new intelligent species and harbor new spacecraft to achieve greater distances, Etc. 

I think this would be cool in the name of SCIENCE!

Welcome to the KSP forums Beatz0121 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It's a good idea, though you shouldn't be surprised if it's come up before, many times in fact which is why it's part of the [**"What Not To Suggest"**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest) list, simply due to its repetition and that there are no plans as of yet for new planets.

The same goes for aliens (we already have aliens, Kerbals!)

So thanks for the suggestion, who knows, the devs may do it one day, but for the time being it's best to think of something new ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
